column1: Little Goat Diner////I've been here half a dozen times now and every time the food is absolute chunky girl heaven!  Such delicious twists on various comfort foods.  It's quality stuff
column2: no doubt.  And the bloody marys are mouth watering deliciousness.  They have a very unique flavor-maybe due to the hot sauce they use? There is often a decent wait time
column3: but 100% worth the wait.  Head to the bar. Grab a bloody and/or a goat milk latte and your table will be ready in no time! Love love love this joint.
